content: हर्म्यं [हृ-यत् मुट् च] {@--1@} A palace, mansion, any large or palatial building; हर्म्यपृष्ठं समारूढः काकोऽपि गरुडायते <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls>; बाह्योद्यानास्थितहरशिरश्चंद्रिकाधौतहर्म्या <ls>Me. 7</ls>; <ls>Rs. 1. 28</ls>; <ls>Bk. 8. 36</ls>, <ls>R. 6. 47</ls>; <ls>Ku. 6. 42.</ls> {@--2@} An oven, a fire-place, hearth. {@--3@} A fiery pit, abode of evil spirits, the infernal regions.
